name: Linc - The Lighting Cultivator
overview:
Linc - The Lighting Cultivator is a not-for-profit corporation working with Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute’s Lighting Research Center and the private sector to foster commercialization of new lighting products and services that advance sustainability.

Created through funding by the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority (NYSERDA), Linc serves as a “virtual incubator” for new businesses and a cultivator for existing businesses. Linc is located at the Saratoga Technology + Energy Park (STEP).

Linc is a new model for technology commercialization, business development, and technology evaluation in the lighting industry.

Member of the Business Incubator Association of New York State.
